title: Can I use a smaller paper size in Fontlab?
content:
I would like to stop using an entire letter sheet when I’m testing small changes in Fontlab. Can I set Fontlab to print to smaller sheets?

 [‹ Working with Word and InDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170913/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14982 "Go to previous forum topic") [Indesign: How do I discard overset text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170913/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44629 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett
